body_html: I got a very similar error: RuntimeError: _cat_out is not implemented for type torch.HalfTensor. To my mind, we could add support for this method for data preparation/loading on CPU so that a single tensor type (namely torch.half) is used on CPU and GPU.

body: I got a very similar error: RuntimeError: _cat_out is not implemented for type torch.HalfTensor. To my mind, we could add support for this method for data preparation/loading on CPU so that a single tensor type (namely torch.half) is used on CPU and GPU.
